document.full_text: the acclaimed hollywood epic "titanic," will hit movie theaters worldwide in a 3d version next year, hollywood studios and its director james cameron said on thursday.
document.title: "titanic" to be released in 3d in theaters worldwide
lines_and_colors: the acclaimed hollywood epic "titanic," will hit movie theaters worldwide in a 3d version next year, hollywood studios and its director james cameron said on thursday.
